message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you for $180. I think it's a fair price considering its worth.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
Bob, thanks for your interest. While $180 is my initial asking price, I can come down to $150. I believe this product will truly benefit you.
I appreciate the discount, but $150 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $125 for it.
